name: InputFilter
desc: An encoder-decoder that reads input data from a stream.

items.name: init(FilterOperation, using: Algorithm, bufferCapacity: Int, readingFrom: (Int) -> D?)
items.desc: Creates an input filter that can be used to compress or decompress data.

items.name: func readData(ofLength: Int) -> Data?
items.desc: Reads processed data from the input filter.
